name: PasswordPeeker
creator: Peter Rietveld
summary: Adds a trigger to a password field to peek for typo's
detailedDescription: With this password field you give users the ability to peek for typo's in their given password. This can be savely done by clicking on the eye-icon at the end of the textfield. As long as the eye-icon is clicked the password will be visible, and when the mouse is released the password will become invisible again automatically.
